basics.label: Jr.Software Trainee
basics.co: I seek challenging opportunities where I can fully use my skills for the success of the organization.
basics.expe: Working in Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation . Trained 700 faculty members and 1lakh+ students for google india code to learn contest and my role is a trainer, and also Trained B.Tech Students on their Projects in the areas of Web Designing and Programming in HTML  and also trained MIT App Inventor tool to develop Android applications,  and now learning new approach PWA(Progressive Web App)

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores
